<title level="1" pfs="">[Skinsaw Murderer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2492)</title>

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Skinsaw Murderer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2492)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 50</row>

**Perception** +17

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[daggers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (2), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_, silver [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=13), [_Skinsaw mask_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2354), [War Razor](/Weapons.aspx?ID=103)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 120

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_shortsword_ +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
war razor +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   When attacking a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature, the Skinsaw murderer deals 1d6 additional precision damage.

**[Twin Takedown](/Feats.aspx?ID=494)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) 

</column>
name: Skinsaw Murderer
